==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
{{compound|zh|符|pos1=short for {{l|zh|符籙|pos=mysterious writing used by {{w|Daoist}}s to fight against ghosts and spirits}}|水|t2=water}}. A {{w|Daoist}} priest would burn writing which was deemed to have magical properties, and then mix the ashes with water. This water was believed to have healing powers. [[w:Zhang Jiao|Zhang Jue]] (d. 184), the leader of the {{w|Yellow Turban Rebellion}} gave out this water during the outbreak of an [[epidemic]] disease. In this way, he attracted a large following, which eventually led to the [[rebellion]].
